forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 96. Heat index values as high as 103. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 73. Heat index values as high as 101. West wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday

High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
